detail_desc: Scarf in woven fabric with a brushed finish. Fringes along the short sides.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight-cut hems.

Wide shirt in cotton poplin with a pointed collar, buttons down the front and pleat at the back. Long sleeves with pleats for added width and volume, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Crop tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and an elasticated hem.
Hat with earflaps, an appliqué on the side and a hook and loop strap under the chin. Lined with faux fur and fleece.

Knee-length dress in glittery stretch jersey with a small stand-up collar and a small opening at the back with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck. Opening at the front and a seam under the bust. Partly lined.
Soft, lined bra in stretch silk with lace details. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and wide elastication at the hem.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Short shorts in a soft, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated waist.
Hi-tops with a lightly padded edge and tongue, loop at the back, lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Pile linings and insoles.
Fitted top in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Boys’ briefs in soft cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with toe caps, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Off-the-shoulder playsuit in a viscose weave with elastication at the top, short, wide sleeves, and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Fully-fashioned trainers with a rib-trimmed shaft and zip at the back. Fabric insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Sun hat in a patterned cotton weave with decorative gathers around the brim, a bow at the back and ties under the chin. Cotton lining.
Short, straight-cut dress in sturdy jersey with short puff sleeves with narrow, concealed elastication. Detachable tie belt at the waist and a concealed zip at the back.
Jumper in textured-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Tunic in soft fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with two buttons at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in airy linen jersey with a round neckline and straight-cut hem.
Hat knitted in soft merino wool with a pompom on top and a ribbed, foldover hem.
Metal rings in various designs.
Straight-cut blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar, V-neck with a concealed button at the front, and short cap sleeves.

Short parka in a patterned cotton weave with a small stand-up collar and zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Flap chest and front pockets with concealed press-studs, an adjustable tab with a concealed press-stud and slit at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Treggings in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist with a decorative button and fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and decorative seams at the knees.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and no buttons.
Printed jersey top with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Gloves in soft leather and twill made from a wool blend. Uppers in twill with decorative seams and an adjustable leather tab and press-stud. Palms in leather with elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Leggings in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a high waist for a good fit over the tummy. Ribbing at the waist and hems.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist (except in sizes 12-14+Y). Zip fly, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Dress shirt in a premium cotton weave with a full spread collar, bib front with pin-tucks and a concealed button band. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Unicorn costume in soft velour with a sheen. Hood with embroidered details, appliqués and faux fur sections. Lightly padded wings, a detachable tail, zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a jacket and shorts in a soft linen and cotton blend. Jacket with notch lapels, buttons at the front, a chest pocket, flap welt front pockets and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Unlined. Shorts with an adjustable elasticated waist, button fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Detachable elastic belt with D-rings and short slits in the sides.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with long sleeves and buttons on one shoulder.
V-neck top in woven fabric with spaghetti shoulder straps.
Make-up bag in semi-transparent plastic with a zip at the top that continues half-way down each short side. Unlined. Size approx. 9x9.5x17.5 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline.
Short shorts in a soft, patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton jersey with a collar, button placket and slits in the sides.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Low, imitation leather sandals with an elasticated heel strap. Rubber insoles and soles.
Short, fitted dress in lace with a round neckline, concealed zip at the back and cap sleeves. Lined.
Short-sleeved football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with print motifs front and back.
Thin, satin-covered Alice band with grosgrain on the inside.
Short, fitted jersey top with short sleeves and a visible seam down the front. Slightly shorter front with a knot detail at the hem.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit wool and nylon blend.
Top in sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved shirt in a soft, organic cotton double weave with a round neckline and button placket.
Glasses case in imitation leather with an imitation suede lining. Flap with a reinforced front and press-stud fastening. Size 6x16 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved T-shirts in soft pima cotton jersey with press-studs on the shoulders.
Windbreaker in a nylon weave with a lined, drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Side pockets, an inner pocket and elasticated cuffs. Lined.
5-pocket, high-waisted trousers in washed stretch twill with a zip fly and button, and slim legs.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams, elasticated hems and reinforced elastic foot straps. Press-studs at the sides and adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Reflective details. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace. One of the chains is decorated with leaf-shaped pendants and the other has a round pendant. Adjustable length 40-47 cm.
Longer-style top in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves and a rounded hem.
Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, buttons down the front and two slits at the front.
Calf-length jersey dress in a viscose blend. Wide neckline, tie shoulder straps and a slit at the back.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
Short, V-neck blouse in woven fabric with shimmering sequined embroidery. Drawstring at the front and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and front pockets. No buttons.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in patterned chiffon crêpe with elastication at the top, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.
Short dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a V-neck at the back with lacing and long, wide sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.
Fitted top in a linen and viscose weave with a sweetheart neckline and short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, frill-trimmed fake pockets at the front and real pockets at the back.
Blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front, short puff sleeves, a seam at the waist and a wide flounce at the hem.

Mesh trainers with rubber and imitation leather details, a padded edge and lacing at the front. Decorative grosgrain trim with a text print along the tongue and back of the heel. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Blouse in woven fabric with a flounce at the top, long, cuffed sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Round, gold-coloured button at the top and cuffs.

Oversized shirt woven in a linen blend with a collar and V-neck with a pleat at the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttons at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hat in a soft cable knit containing some wool with a faux fur pompom on top and sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover hood, print motif on the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 50x50 cm.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit chenille with hole-knit sections at the front and down the sleeves. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a faux fur pompom on top.
